description:
Shouldn't need to upload a VHD in a tarball
If we have a VHD file then we should be able to upload it as-is (devstack does not work - not sure if rest of XS plugins will work)
Tarballs should only be needed for VHD chains
title: VHD file(not zipped) is not supported
